Package org.soen6441.strategypattern

Class CheaterPlayerStrategy

java.lang.Object
org.soen6441.strategypattern.Strategy
org.soen6441.strategypattern.CheaterPlayerStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CheaterPlayerStrategy
extends Strategy
implements java.io.Serializable
This Strategy class belongs to the Cheater Player. It encapsulates the behavior of a Cheater Player. This strategic player only issues deploy and advance orders to attacks on neighboring countries, and increases the number of armies on its countries that have enemy neighbors.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • CheaterPlayerStrategy

      public CheaterPlayerStrategy​(Player p_Player, GameModelNew p_GameModelNew)
      The constructor initializes the cheater player and the game model new object as well as the Random object is created.
      Parameters:
      p_Player - The Player whose strategy is Cheater.
      p_GameModelNew - The Reference of GamemodelNew to get the Map on which the match is to be played.

  • Method Details

    • toAttack

      public java.util.ArrayList<Country> toAttack()
      This is an overridden toAttack method. The random player gets its own strongest country, the source country by calling the toDefend method. Then it randomly chooses one of the neighboring countries of the source country.
      Specified by:
      toAttack in class Strategy
      Returns:
      It returns an Arraylist containing the source country and the target country to attack to.

    • toDefend

      public Country toDefend()
      This is an overridden toDefend method. The random player randomly selects one of the countries owned by it.
      Specified by:
      toDefend in class Strategy
      Returns:
      The country that it wants to deploy army to or move the armies from in case of an attack.

    • createOrder

      public Order createOrder()
      This is an overridden method to create an order. The cheater player can issue a deploy order or an advance order only. In the case of advance order if the source country has armies less than 1, then instead of an advance order the random player chooses to issue a deploy order on that country.
      Specified by:
      createOrder in class Strategy
      Returns:
      It returns the order object issued.

    • strategyName

      public java.lang.String strategyName()
      This is an overridden method to provide the strategy of the player.
      Specified by:
      strategyName in class Strategy
      Returns:
      a String specifying "Cheater" - strategy of this class.
